name: Zoo Story - Wonder Zoo
description:
************ Download the Zoo Story - Wonder Zoo*************
This animal zoo game called "Zoo Story: The Animal Games“ introduces various animals to the childlike Lion, Monkey, Giraffe, Crocodile, Panda and many others.
Your child will learn what the animals eat? And how to fix a broken fence? This knowledge is acquired by performing actions in the right order, such as arranging a fence or washing and feeding animals, fishing, rescue emergency and cleaning zoo.
Your Child can perform following activities inside the zoo trip game:
+ Clean up cages and residences.
+ Crazy day out of cleaning zoo and animal’s home with the pet’s helper
+ Fun time with the cute baby pets
+ Making adventure trip by doing animals discovery, sightseeing in the jungle safari and the adventure park
+ Attending the zoo show and enjoying the dancing giraffe
+ Some of them got injured so take care of them with the availability of rescue emergency.
+ Animals are hungry, feed them well.
+ Find the Hidden cute animals.
+ To let them learn, let's take them to the very famous jungle safari zoo in the city.

Download Now! This Amazing Zoo Game "Zoo Story: The Animal Games"
